name: aesthetician
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a trained person whose job is to improve the appearance and health of a customer's skin: She gets a facial every two weeks from a well-known aesthetician. The centre's aestheticians offer treatments such as micro peels, which can help with age spots and sun spots.
More examplesFewer examplesOur members are all skincare specialists, both nurses and aestheticians.An aesthetician inserts a sterile needle that emits a low-level electrical current into the hair follicle, killing it so it won't produce any more hair. Sally is a licensed aesthetician and massage therapist.
